TUTORIAL.DESCRIPTION: Every day, you can play two game modes: "Country of the day" and "Flag of the day". There is one flag and one country to guess per day. They will be reset at UTC+2. (midnight in France).
TUTORIAL.F_DESC: Don't panic, this mode is much simpler. The day's flag is displayed in full. All you have to do is select the corresponding country name.
TUTORIAL.S_DESC: You can consult your statistics at any time. They are divided into two parts: statistics for the “Country of the Day” mode and those for the “Flag of the Day” mode. For both modes, you'll see the same statistics: number of games played, number of victories and average number of tries per day. You can also see the number of consecutive days you've played, and an infographic showing a scale of your number of attempts per day over the last year.

COUNTRY.DESC: In “Country of the Day” mode, you have to guess the mystery country. To do this, you start with no information. Enter the name of the first country you wish to submit. It's highly unlikely that you'll get it right the first time. You'll then have information about the country you've just entered:
COUNTRY.BORDERS: The number of borders from the country
COUNTRY.CODE: These informations are displayed with a color code and possibly arrows:
COUNTRY.GREEN: Both countries have the same caracteristic
COUNTRY.ORANGE: You’re close to the right answer. For nubmer [-30% < country of the day < +30%], for languages, they have at least one common language
COUNTRY.RED: Both countries have nothing in common
COUNTRY.UPPER: The country of the day has a higher value
COUNTRY.LOWER: The country of the day has a lower value
COUNTRY.CLUE: You can also ask to reveal a clue about the country of the day. You have three clues available at 5th, 10th and 15th try. They are the currency (symbol), the capital and the flag. Revealing a clue will not impact your statistics.
COUNTRY.END: Once you've found the right country, you will have to wait for the next day to play again.
